description: Residential building templates - houses, townhouses, duplexes, and apartments with comprehensive measurement assumptions, derivation formulas, and productivity standards based on Australian construction industry data

templates.name: 2-Bedroom House
templates.description: Single storey detached house, 100m² GFA, brick veneer, steel roof, strip footings

specifications.construction_notes: 110mm face brick + 40mm cavity + 90mm timber frame + 10mm plasterboard

measurement_assumptions.gfa_definition: Residential GFA measured from internal faces of external walls per NCC Volume 2. Includes all habitable and non-habitable rooms (bedrooms, living, kitchen, bathroom, hallway, garage). Excludes external verandahs, carports, and external plant.
measurement_assumptions.derivation_notes: Compact 2-bedroom starter home suitable for couples or small families. Ceiling height 2.7m exceeds NCC minimum 2.4m for habitable rooms. Open-plan living/dining/kitchen maximizes perceived space. Single garage integrated into main building envelope. Foundation strip footings on 600mm depth (standard clay soil assumption). Brick veneer external walls provide thermal mass and Australian suburban aesthetic.

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 kitchen per dwelling regardless of GFA. Standard fitout includes 3.5m linear benchtop, overhead cabinets, sink, cooktop space.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 1 kitchen × $8,000-12,000 standard fitout (not scaled with GFA)

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 bathroom for 2-bedroom house. Includes shower, basin, toilet, tiling.
1 hot water unit per dwelling. 135L-170L capacity for 2-3 occupants.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 1 × HWS unit (electric or gas) regardless of GFA

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: Single storey 100m² = 1-2 zones maximum. Living area + bedrooms zone.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 2 zones: 1 split system living + 1 bedroom zone (optional)

external_wall_area.waste_applied: Brick veneer 1.07 (7% waste) = 69.3m² gross for material takeoff

roof_area.formula: Roof Area = GFA × 1.20 (pitched roof factor 22.5° standard)

internal_wall_framing.calculation: √(100 × 4) × 0.6 = 20 × 0.6 = 12m linear partitions × 2.7m height × 2 faces = 64.8m² stud area

flooring.formula: Floor Finish Area = GFA (all areas receive finish)

power_points.formula: Power Points = GFA ÷ 6m² (residential standard per NCC)
power_points.notes: Minimum NCC requirement. Includes living, bedrooms, kitchen circuits, garage.

light_points.notes: Ceiling penetrations for downlights, pendants. Includes internal + garage.

plumbing_fixtures.calculation: 100m² ÷ 50 = 2 fixtures (1 bathroom suite: 1 shower/basin/WC combo + 1 laundry tub)
plumbing_fixtures.waste_applied: Plumbing pipe 1.05 (5% waste) for rough-in routing

bricklaying.derivation: External walls 69.3m² ÷ 5.78 m²/day = 12.0 person-days ÷ 1 = 12 days (2-person gang)

carpentry_framing.derivation: Wall framing 71.3m² ÷ 2.0 m²/day = 35.7 days (1 carpenter); Roof framing 126m² ÷ 20 m²/day = 6.3 days

painting.derivation: Interior walls 64.8m² + ceiling 102m² = 166.8m² ÷ 2.5 m²/hr = 66.7 hours = 8.3 days (1 painter)

electrical.first_fix: 17 power points × 0.4 hrs = 6.8 hrs; 10 light points × 0.7 hrs = 7.0 hrs; total ~14 hours
electrical.second_fix: 17 power × 0.3 = 5.1 hrs; 10 lights × 0.2 = 2.0 hrs; switchboard = 4 hrs; total ~11 hours
electrical.derivation: 25 hours total ÷ 8 hrs/day = 3.1 days (1 electrician + apprentice)

plumbing.rough_in: Bathroom 1 × 8 hrs + laundry 1 × 4 hrs + drainage ~12 hrs = 24 hours
plumbing.second_fix: Fixtures 2 × 2.5 hrs = 5 hrs; HWS connection 3 hrs; testing 2 hrs = 10 hours

templates.name: 3-Bedroom House
templates.description: Single storey detached house, 150m² GFA, brick veneer, steel roof, strip footings

specifications.construction_notes: 110mm face brick + 40mm cavity + 90mm timber frame + 10mm plasterboard

measurement_assumptions.gfa_definition: Residential GFA measured from internal faces of external walls per NCC Volume 2. Includes all habitable and non-habitable rooms (3 bedrooms, living, dining, kitchen, 2 bathrooms, hallway, double garage). Excludes external verandahs and carports.
measurement_assumptions.derivation_notes: Standard 3-bedroom family home. Master bedroom includes ensuite bathroom. Separate living and dining areas. Double garage integrated into main roof line. Ceiling height 2.7m standard for all habitable rooms per NCC. Main bathroom serves bedrooms 2 and 3. Foundation strip footings 600mm depth on clay soil. Brick veneer provides thermal performance and durability.

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 kitchen per dwelling. Standard includes 4.5m linear benchtop, overhead cabinets, pantry, island bench.
2 bathrooms (1 main + 1 ensuite). Main = bath/shower, basin, WC. Ensuite = shower, basin, WC.
1 hot water unit per dwelling. 250L-315L capacity for 4-5 occupants.
Single storey 150m² = 2 zones. Living/dining zone + bedroom wing zone.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 2 zones: 1 living area split system + 1 bedroom ducted or splits

power_points.notes: Distribution: bedrooms 3×2=6, living 4, dining 2, kitchen 6, bathrooms 2×1=2, garage 2, laundry 1 = 23 minimum

light_points.notes: Bedrooms 3×1=3, living 2, dining 1, kitchen 2, bathrooms 2×1=2, hallway 3, garage 2 = 15 points

electrical.first_fix: 25 power × 0.4 = 10 hrs; 15 lights × 0.7 = 10.5 hrs; total ~21 hours
electrical.second_fix: 25 power × 0.3 = 7.5 hrs; 15 lights × 0.2 = 3 hrs; board 4 hrs = 14.5 hours

plumbing.rough_in: 2 bathrooms × 8 hrs + laundry 4 hrs + drainage 15 hrs = 35 hours
plumbing.second_fix: 2 bathroom suites × 3.5 hrs + laundry + HWS = 12 hours

templates.name: 4-Bedroom House
templates.description: Single storey detached house, 200m² GFA, brick veneer, steel roof, strip footings

specifications.construction_notes: 110mm face brick + 40mm cavity + 90mm timber frame + 10mm plasterboard

measurement_assumptions.gfa_definition: Residential GFA measured from internal faces per NCC Volume 2. Includes 4 bedrooms, living, dining, kitchen, 2 bathrooms, hallway, double garage. Excludes alfresco, carport.
measurement_assumptions.derivation_notes: Large family home with 4 bedrooms. Master bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite. Separate living and dining. Study nook for home office. Double garage with internal access. Ceiling height 2.7m throughout. Main bathroom serves bedrooms 2, 3, 4. Strip footings 600-750mm depth depending on soil classification.

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 kitchen per dwelling. Larger 13.5m² includes island bench, walk-in pantry, 6m linear benchtop.
200m² single storey = 2-3 zones. Living/dining + bedroom wing + master bedroom.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 3 zones: ducted system or 3 split systems

power_points.notes: 4 bedrooms 4×2=8, living 5, dining 3, kitchen 7, bathrooms 2, garage 3, laundry 2, study 2 = 32 minimum

light_points.notes: Bedrooms 4×1=4, living 3, dining 2, kitchen 3, bathrooms 2, hallway 4, garage 2 = 20 points

electrical.first_fix: 34 power × 0.4 = 13.6 hrs; 20 lights × 0.7 = 14 hrs; total ~28 hours
electrical.second_fix: 34 power × 0.3 = 10.2 hrs; 20 lights × 0.2 = 4 hrs; board 5 hrs = 19.2 hours

plumbing.rough_in: 2 bathrooms × 8 hrs + laundry 4 hrs + kitchen 3 hrs + drainage 18 hrs = 41 hours
plumbing.second_fix: 2 bathroom suites × 3.5 hrs + laundry + kitchen + HWS = 15 hours

templates.name: 5-Bedroom House
templates.description: Single storey detached house, 280m² GFA, brick veneer, steel roof, strip footings

specifications.construction_notes: 110mm face brick + 40mm cavity + 90mm timber frame + 10mm plasterboard

measurement_assumptions.gfa_definition: Residential GFA measured from internal faces per NCC Volume 2. Includes 5 bedrooms, multiple living areas, 3 bathrooms, large kitchen/dining, hallway, double garage. Excludes alfresco and outdoor areas.
measurement_assumptions.derivation_notes: Executive 5-bedroom family home. Master bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite. Two additional living areas (media room or rumpus). Study/home office. Main bathroom serves bedrooms 2-3, third bathroom serves bedrooms 4-5. Large kitchen with butler's pantry. Double garage with workshop space. Ceiling height 2.7m standard. Strip footings 750mm depth on mixed soil.

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 large kitchen 19.3m² with island bench, butler's pantry, 8m linear benchtop.
1 × 400L capacity for 6-8 occupants, or 2 × 250L units zoned.
280m² single storey = 3-4 zones. Living/dining, family room, master bedroom wing, children's bedroom wing.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 4 zones: ducted system with zone dampers

power_points.notes: 5 bedrooms 5×2=10, living areas 3×4=12, dining 4, kitchen 8, study 3, bathrooms 3, garage 3, laundry 2 = 45 minimum

light_points.notes: Bedrooms 5×1=5, living areas 3×2=6, dining 2, kitchen 4, study 2, bathrooms 3, hallway 4, garage 2 = 28 points

plumbing_fixtures.calculation: 280m² ÷ 50 = 5.6 → 6 fixtures (3 bathroom suites + 1 laundry + 1 kitchen + 1 wet bar)

electrical.first_fix: 47 power × 0.4 = 18.8 hrs; 28 lights × 0.7 = 19.6 hrs; total ~39 hours
electrical.second_fix: 47 power × 0.3 = 14.1 hrs; 28 lights × 0.2 = 5.6 hrs; board 6 hrs = 25.7 hours

plumbing.rough_in: 3 bathrooms × 8 hrs + laundry 4 hrs + kitchen 3 hrs + drainage 24 hrs = 55 hours
plumbing.second_fix: 3 bathroom suites × 3.5 hrs + laundry + kitchen + HWS = 18 hours

templates.name: 2-Bedroom Townhouse
templates.description: Townhouse, 90m² GFA, brick veneer, steel roof, slab on ground

specifications.construction_notes: 110mm face brick + 40mm cavity + 90mm timber frame + 10mm plasterboard

measurement_assumptions.gfa_definition: Townhouse GFA measured from internal faces per NCC Volume 2. Two-storey narrow footprint (5-6m width typical). Includes ground floor (living, kitchen, garage, laundry, WC) + first floor (2 bedrooms, bathroom). Excludes courtyard, balcony.
measurement_assumptions.derivation_notes: Compact 2-storey townhouse on narrow lot (typical 5.5m frontage). Efficient layout with garage at ground, bedrooms upstairs. Single bathroom serves all bedrooms. Staircase ~3m² footprint (counted once in GFA per NCC). Slab on ground foundation. Brick veneer ground floor, potential timber cladding upper level. Ceiling height 2.7m on both levels.

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 stairwell internal. 13-14 treads, 1.0m width minimum. Landing 1.2m × 1.0m.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 1 staircase × 14 treads = fixed element (not scaled with GFA)

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 kitchen per townhouse. Compact 3.0m linear benchtop, galley layout.
1 bathroom upstairs. Shower, basin, WC. Ground floor WC separate.
90m² townhouse = 1-2 zones. Ground floor living + upstairs bedrooms.

external_wall_area.formula: Wall Area = Perimeter × Ceiling Height × Storeys

power_points.notes: Living 4, kitchen 5, bedrooms 2×2=4, bathroom 1, garage 1 = 15 points

light_points.notes: Living 2, kitchen 1, bedrooms 2×1=2, bathroom 1, stairs 1, garage 1, hallway 1 = 9 points

plumbing_fixtures.calculation: 90m² ÷ 50 = 1.8 → 2 fixtures (1 bathroom suite + 1 ground floor WC)

electrical.first_fix: 15 power × 0.4 = 6 hrs; 9 lights × 0.7 = 6.3 hrs; total ~13 hours
electrical.second_fix: 15 power × 0.3 = 4.5 hrs; 9 lights × 0.2 = 1.8 hrs; board 3 hrs = 9.3 hours

plumbing.rough_in: 1 bathroom × 8 hrs + ground WC 3 hrs + drainage 10 hrs = 21 hours
plumbing.second_fix: 1 bathroom × 3 hrs + WC 1.5 hrs + HWS 3 hrs = 7.5 hours

templates.name: 3-Bedroom Townhouse
templates.description: Townhouse, 130m² GFA, brick veneer, steel roof, slab on ground

specifications.construction_notes: 110mm face brick + 40mm cavity + 90mm timber frame + 10mm plasterboard

measurement_assumptions.gfa_definition: Townhouse GFA measured from internal faces. Two-storey design, typical 6m frontage. Ground floor: living, dining, kitchen, powder room, laundry, garage. First floor: 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (main + ensuite).
measurement_assumptions.derivation_notes: Family-sized 3-bedroom townhouse. Master with ensuite, main bathroom serves bedrooms 2-3. Separate living and dining areas. Powder room on ground floor for guests. Staircase ~3.5m² counted once in GFA. Slab on ground with first floor timber or concrete. Ceiling height 2.7m both levels.

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 kitchen per townhouse. 4.0m linear benchtop with island or peninsula.
2 bathrooms upstairs + 1 powder room ground floor.

external_wall_area.formula: Wall Area = Perimeter × Ceiling Height × Storeys

power_points.notes: Living 4, dining 2, kitchen 6, bedrooms 3×2=6, bathrooms 2, garage 1, laundry 1 = 22 points

light_points.notes: Living 2, dining 1, kitchen 2, bedrooms 3×1=3, bathrooms 2, stairs 1, garage 1, hallway 1 = 13 points

electrical.first_fix: 22 power × 0.4 = 8.8 hrs; 13 lights × 0.7 = 9.1 hrs; total ~18 hours
electrical.second_fix: 22 power × 0.3 = 6.6 hrs; 13 lights × 0.2 = 2.6 hrs; board 4 hrs = 13.2 hours

plumbing.rough_in: 2 bathrooms × 8 hrs + powder room 3 hrs + drainage 14 hrs = 33 hours
plumbing.second_fix: 2 bathrooms × 3 hrs + WC 1.5 hrs + HWS 3 hrs = 10.5 hours

templates.name: 4-Bedroom Townhouse
templates.description: Townhouse, 170m² GFA, brick veneer, steel roof, slab on ground

specifications.construction_notes: 110mm face brick + 40mm cavity + 90mm timber frame + 10mm plasterboard

measurement_assumptions.gfa_definition: Townhouse GFA measured from internal faces. Two-storey, wider 7-8m frontage. Ground floor: living, dining, kitchen, family room, powder room, laundry, double garage. First floor: 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms.
measurement_assumptions.derivation_notes: Spacious 4-bedroom townhouse for family. Master with ensuite. Main bathroom serves bedrooms 2-4. Separate living, dining, and family room. Double garage with internal access. Powder room on ground floor. Staircase ~4m² footprint. Slab on ground with first floor timber/concrete. Ceiling height 2.7m both levels.

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 internal stairwell. 13-14 treads, 1.2m width for double garage access.
1 large kitchen 27m². Island bench, walk-in pantry, 5.5m linear benchtop.
170m² = 2-3 zones. Ground living + upstairs + master bedroom.

external_wall_area.formula: Wall Area = Perimeter × Ceiling Height × Storeys

power_points.notes: Living 5, dining 2, kitchen 7, family 3, bedrooms 4×2=8, bathrooms 2, garage 2 = 29 points

light_points.notes: Living 2, dining 2, kitchen 2, family 1, bedrooms 4×1=4, bathrooms 2, stairs 1, garage 2, hallway 1 = 17 points

electrical.first_fix: 29 power × 0.4 = 11.6 hrs; 17 lights × 0.7 = 11.9 hrs; total ~24 hours
electrical.second_fix: 29 power × 0.3 = 8.7 hrs; 17 lights × 0.2 = 3.4 hrs; board 5 hrs = 17.1 hours

plumbing.rough_in: 2 bathrooms × 8 hrs + powder room 3 hrs + laundry 4 hrs + drainage 16 hrs = 39 hours
plumbing.second_fix: 2 bathrooms × 3 hrs + WC 1.5 hrs + laundry 2 hrs + HWS 3 hrs = 12.5 hours

templates.name: 2-Bedroom Duplex (per side)
templates.description: Duplex unit, 85m² GFA per side, brick veneer, steel roof, slab on ground

specifications.construction_notes: 110mm face brick + 40mm cavity + 90mm timber frame + 10mm plasterboard. Shared dividing wall 200mm double stud with acoustic insulation.

measurement_assumptions.gfa_definition: Duplex GFA measured per side (85m² each = 170m² total). NCC Volume 2 internal faces. Party wall to center line. Includes bedrooms, living, kitchen, bathroom, garage. Excludes courtyard.
measurement_assumptions.derivation_notes: Single storey duplex. Mirror image units. Party wall 200mm double stud with acoustic insulation per NCC F5. Brick veneer three sides. Slab on ground. Separate title per side.

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 shared dividing wall 200mm double stud. ~12m length for 85m² footprint.

light_points.notes: Bedrooms 2, living 2, kitchen 1, bathroom 1, hallway 2, garage 1

electrical.second_fix: 15 power × 0.3 = 4.5 hrs; 9 lights × 0.2 = 1.8 hrs; board 3 hrs = 9.3 hours

plumbing.rough_in: 1 bathroom × 8 hrs + laundry 4 hrs + drainage 10 hrs = 22 hours
plumbing.second_fix: 1 bathroom × 3 hrs + laundry 2 hrs + HWS 3 hrs = 8 hours

templates.name: 3-Bedroom Duplex (per side)
templates.description: Duplex, 125m² GFA, brick veneer, standard finishes

specifications.construction_notes: 110mm face brick + 40mm cavity + 90mm timber frame + 10mm plasterboard

measurement_assumptions.derivation_notes: 3-bedroom duplex design. Ceiling height 2.7m per NCC. Standard Australian residential construction.
